import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { AuthService } from '../../services/auth.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-login', templateUrl: './login.component.html', styleUrls: ['./login.component.css'], }) export class LoginComponent { user = { name: '', tipoDocumento: '', numDocumento: 0, password: '', }; constructor(private authService: AuthService) {} userLogin() {} }
